dependencies: Terraform CLI downloaded from releases.hashicorp.com using build arg TERRAFORM_VERSION (Dockerfile)
tf-migrate binary copied into image (Dockerfile; file: /tf-migrate)
GitHub Actions: actions/checkout@v4, docker/setup-buildx-action@v3, docker/build-push-action@v6; uses curl + jq in workflow steps (/.github/workflows/check-tf-version.yml)
architectural_resources: Local/CI container runtime (Docker) used to run Terraform and tf-migrate
External service/API dependency: HashiCorp Checkpoint API (https://checkpoint-api.hashicorp.com) to fetch latest Terraform version (workflow)
External artifact source: HashiCorp Terraform release downloads (https://releases.hashicorp.com) (Dockerfile)
